main.title: Geoalert Analytics Platform
main.description: Stay aware, analyse and make decisions faster - global geoanalytics platform powered by Earth Observation and AI

whatIs.title: What is Geoalert?
whatIs.description: We provide AI powered instant analysis of any location in the world on satellite and aerial imagery to free data analysts from the cartographic routine work and to give cartographers powerful imagery analysis tools

urbanMapping.title: Urban Mapping
urbanMapping.description: Access validated and enriched data of infrastructure: building footprints and roads. Get updates on construction progress at certain sites and on overall city development

mapFlow.title: Map Flow
mapFlow.description: Get analytics, not pixels. Accelerate your data workflow by our imagery analysis platform

partners.title: Our clients and parners
partners.description: We have been honored to partner with these clients
